document_title: Excess estrogen: Signs, causes and prevention
subsection_name: thua-estrogen.json_3_Complications can occur when estrogen is high
subsection_content:
Excess estrogen not only affects the patient's reproductive health but is also a prerequisite for the development of diseases such as:
Causes blood clots to appear; Thyroid disease; Benign breast tumor; Ovarian Cancer; Breast cancer; Stroke; Heart attack; Depression (common in men)
